about.title: About us
about.text: Everything Alpaca was founded in 1998. We design and manufacture premium textiles focused on fine natural fibers, primarily alpaca wool. Our main office and distribution center are located in Los Angeles, United States, while our production center is based in Arequipa, Peru. We serve the American, Canadian, and South American markets.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Our mission is to deliver finished products of exceptional quality and long-lasting durability. We grow alongside our suppliers and artisans while promoting ethical and sustainable production with minimal environmental impact.

products.featuredSubtitle: A curated selection of our best pieces in alpaca fiber.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.text: Alpaca fiber is one of the most sustainable natural fibers, biodegradable and requiring minimal environmental impact.

fair.title: Fair Trade
fair.text: We work closely with artisans and suppliers, ensuring ethical and fair trade practices at every stage.

zero.title: Zero Waste
zero.text: Our production minimizes waste through responsible sourcing and efficient manufacturing processes.

animal.title: Animal Welfare
animal.text: We are committed to ethical treatment and respectful care of alpacas throughout the supply chain.
